entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
